snippet: New York City officials showed potential bidders through a stripped-down Tavern on Wednesday, hoping they will make proposals for a moderately priced restaurant and bar.
abstract: New York City officials showed potential bidders through a stripped-down Tavern on Wednesday, hoping they will make proposals for a moderately priced restaurant and bar.
lead_paragraph: They didn't kick the tires - Tavern on the Green doesn't have any, never did - but more than 100 representatives of potential bidders for the once-glamorous restaurant in Central Park examined the now pared-down premises during an hourlong, city-run tour on Wednesday.

headline.main: Tavern on the Green, Take Three
